review: I cannot stress enough how much I love Google Chromecast.  I have been using android phones after i ditched iOS a few years back.  Chromecast is the perfect complement to an Android device (and it also works with iPhone, if that is your poison of choice).  Besides the usual Hulu, Netflix, Youtube etc. that run so seamlessly on your TV via this dongle, the best feature is the seamless screen-mirroring from your Android device.  Showing photos and videos to family from your phone is a breeze.  Reading emails on your big screen TV via mirroring is a breeze.  Compare it to Apple  TV and the price-point is just so much better with Chromecast.Its seamless, its easy.  I love it for everything I use it for.There is a limited selection of Apps that currently support Chromecast, so check and make sure that it will run anything specific you are looking for.  However, remember, screen mirroring is always an option.
